title: A true relation of all suche Englishe captaines and lieuetenants, as haue beene slaine in the Lowe Countries of Flaunders together with those now liuing, as also of such as as [sic] are fled to the enimie / collected by Iohn Lingham, clarke to Captaine William Martin seruitore there this 8. of Iuly, 1584.
author: Lingham, John.
publisher: By Roger Warde, dwelling neere Holburne Conduit at the signe of the Talbot,
